mapper.select: SELECT ta.u_id username, ta.u_name name, ta.u_phone phone, tb.u_auth auth FROM userlist ta LEFT join ( SELECT ta.u_id, GROUP_CONCAT(ta.u_auth SEPARATOR ",") u_auth FROM userauth ta GROUP BY ta.u_id ) tb ON ta.u_id = tb.u_id
